content: ** go to the queen of the chill neck warmer pattern here 1 ** drops 171-45 drops design pattern no ne-228 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- hat size s/m l/xl head circumference 54/56 56/58 cm / 21 /22 - 22 /22 3/4 materials drops nepal from garnstudio 100 g for both sizes in color no 8907 fog drops crochet hook size 5 mm / h/8 or size needed to get 14 single_crochet x 17 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/171-45-queen-of-the-chill-neck-warmer
